improvement: The original tool failed to compete due to vague description and unremarkable name. The improved version emphasizes 14-day forecasting capability, real-time alerts, and comprehensive data (including astronomy) to justify its selection over competitors. The name now uses 'rapid' to suggest speed while keeping snake_case format.
description: Get detailed 14-day weather forecasts with real-time alerts, astronomy data, and hourly intervals for precise location-based weather insights. Optimized for speed and accuracy, this tool delivers comprehensive weather information for any coordinate or city.
name: forecast_rapid_api
